description.value:
Special: Tearing, Unwieldy

Note: Wielded as a Slung Rig over the shoulder, or just implanted into the flesh where the arm was. Requires a Strength Bonus of 5 or suffer -10 to WS per SB Less than this. If this weapon causes Righteous Fury, it deals an extra 2d10 Damage rather than 1d10 (or causes two critical hits if using OW)
